events.message: I received my order last week but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I need to return it.
The request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the mention of refund and return in the customer's message.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specializing in refund requests for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your refund?
Could you please share any photos of the product if there is a defect or explain more about why you want to return it? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The product is fine but it doesn't match the description on your website, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a full refund once the product is returned to us. I will send you a prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid shipping label, it makes returning the product easier.
Your refund has been processed and the amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We are reaching out to ensure that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us again if you need any further assistance.
